Package dao

Class CDDAO

java.lang.Object
dao.CDDAO
public class CDDAO extends Object
Data Access Object for CD entity. Manages database operations for CDs including CRUD operations and search functionality.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Library Management System

  • Constructor Details

    • CDDAO

      public CDDAO()

  • Method Details

    • initializeTable

      public void initializeTable()
      Initializes the cds table in the database. Creates the table with a foreign key relationship to the media table.

    • findById

      public CD findById(int id)
      Finds a CD by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the CD ID to search for
      Returns:
      CD object if found, null otherwise

    • insert

      public int insert(int mediaId, String artist, String genre, int duration)
      Inserts a new CD record into the database.
      Parameters:
      mediaId - the ID from the media table
      artist - the CD's artist
      genre - the CD's genre
      duration - the CD's duration in minutes
      Returns:
      the media ID if successful, -1 otherwise

    • findAll

      public List<CD> findAll()
      Retrieves all CDs from the database.
      Returns:
      List of all CD objects

    • searchByTitle

      public List<CD> searchByTitle(String title)
      Searches for CDs by title using pattern matching.
      Parameters:
      title - the title or partial title to search for
      Returns:
      List of matching CD objects

    • searchByArtist

      public List<CD> searchByArtist(String artist)
      Searches for CDs by artist using pattern matching.
      Parameters:
      artist - the artist name or partial name to search for
      Returns:
      List of matching CD objects

    • searchByGenre

      public List<CD> searchByGenre(String genre)
      Searches for CDs by genre using pattern matching.
      Parameters:
      genre - the genre or partial genre to search for
      Returns:
      List of matching CD objects
